Body.Content:
How informed and prepared are you for Windows updates and changes? Bookmark the tools weâ€™re constantly updating and improving based on your feedback. This toolbox consolidates key links and support resources to streamline planning and deployment. 
 
When will this happen: 
The resources summarized in this article are already available and improved. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
Be better informed and equipped to manage Windows updates and changes through the resources listed in this toolbox. Experience improved accessibility, discoverability, localization, and the overall user experience across our channels. 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
No action is needed. Learn more about these existing resources under Additional information. 
 
Additional information: 
Bookmark Your Windows release information toolbox to access and learn more about: 
  • Windows release health 
  • Windows 11 release information page 
  • Microsoft 365 admin center 
  • Windows 11 hotpatch calendar 
  • Hotpatch update history page for Windows 11, version 24H2 Enterprise clients 
  • Windows Roadmap 
  • Windows IT Pro Blog 
  • Windows Server News and Best Practices Blog
